verses.name: Zechariah 13:5
verses.text: But he shall say, I am no prophet, I am an husbandman; for man taught me to keep cattle from my youth.

verses.name: Zechariah 13:6
verses.text: And one shall say unto him, What are these wounds in thine hands? Then he shall answer, Those with which I was wounded in the house of my friends.

verses.name: Zechariah 13:7
verses.text: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.
